title: Song of the Banquet

tokens.lyric: Pure new life that once was sown within the Garden's fertile soil,

lines.raw: [Bb]Pure new life that once was sown within the Garden's fertile soil,

tokens.lyric: Sprouting seed has now become a blossom of heavenly loveliness.

lines.raw: [Eb]Sprouting seed has now become a blossom of heavenly loveliness.

tokens.lyric: Father above, Lord of all, shower your blessing upon

lines.raw: [Cm]Father above, Lord of all, shower your blessing upon

tokens.lyric: This holy day, bond of love forever more!

lines.raw: [F7]This holy day, bond of love forever more!

tokens.lyric: Hal-le-lu-jah, Glorious Day of Joy!

lines.raw: [Bb]Hal-le-lu-jah, Glorious Day of Joy!

tokens.lyric: Fairest flowers of the meadow, tender buds of perfect form.

lines.raw: [Eb]Fairest flowers of the meadow, tender buds of perfect form.

tokens.lyric: Now receive the gift of life and dance in the joy of eternal spring

lines.raw: [Gm]Now receive the gift of life and dance in the joy of eternal spring

tokens.lyric: Heavenly host, men on earth, join us in praising this day;

lines.raw: [Cm7]Heavenly host, men on earth, join us in praising this day;

tokens.lyric: Bless us to share, love's communion faithfully,

lines.raw: [F7]Bless us to share, love's communion faithfully,

tokens.lyric: Hallelujah, Glorious Day of Joy!

lines.raw: [Bb]Hallelujah, Glorious Day of Joy!

tokens.lyric: Hushed we stand in awe before you, ready now to give our pledge,

lines.raw: [Eb]Hushed we stand in awe before you, ready now to give our pledge,

tokens.lyric: To attend and serve completely with an unchanging eternal love.

lines.raw: [D]To attend and serve completely with an unchanging eternal love.

tokens.lyric: Glorious King, mighty God, fill with your blessed grace,

lines.raw: [Gm]Glorious King, mighty God, fill with your blessed grace,

tokens.lyric: This dearest one; holy banquet of our love.

lines.raw: [Cm7]This dearest one; holy banquet of our love.

tokens.lyric: Hallelujah, Glorious Day of Joy!

lines.raw: [F7]Hallelujah, Glorious Day of Joy!

tokens.lyric: Overflowing with your love as dawn proclaims eternal life,

lines.raw: [Bb]Overflowing with your love as dawn proclaims eternal life,

tokens.lyric: Earth and heaven come surround the glorious Parents of mankind,

lines.raw: [Eb]Earth and heaven come surround the glorious Parents of mankind,

tokens.lyric: Gather around, sing the song, fragrant the love of the Lord;

lines.raw: [Gm]Gather around, sing the song, fragrant the love of the Lord;

tokens.lyric: Tell all the world, Spring has come eternally!

lines.raw: [Cm7]Tell all the world, Spring has come eternally!

tokens.lyric: Hallelujah, Glorious Day of Joy!

lines.raw: [F7]Hallelujah, Glorious Day of Joy!
